name: @claudeautopm/plugin-languages
description: Complete programming languages plugin with Python, JavaScript, Node.js, Bash experts, language rules, and example scripts

agents.name: python-backend-engineer
agents.description: Python backend development with FastAPI, async patterns, and modern tooling. Expert in type hints (AsyncIterator, ParamSpec, TypeIs), Pydantic validation, and uv package management.

agents.name: python-backend-expert
agents.description: Advanced Python backend architecture with microservices, Celery, and production deployment. Expert in scalable systems and performance optimization.

agents.name: nodejs-backend-engineer
agents.description: Node.js backend development with Express, Fastify, NestJS. Expert in async iteration (for await...of), AbortSignal, and Symbol.asyncIterator patterns.

agents.name: javascript-frontend-engineer
agents.description: Modern JavaScript/TypeScript frontend development. Expert in ES6 patterns (object shorthand, spread, destructuring), Airbnb style guide, and browser APIs.

agents.name: bash-scripting-expert
agents.description: Bash shell scripting and automation. Expert in production-ready error handling (set -euo pipefail), logging, cleanup handlers, and POSIX compliance.

rules.name: code-quality-standards
rules.description: Language-specific code quality standards with Context7-verified best practices for Python, JavaScript, Node.js, and Bash

rules.name: testing-standards
rules.description: TDD methodology and comprehensive testing standards for all programming languages

scripts.name: python-async-patterns
scripts.description: Demonstrates Python async patterns: AsyncIterator, ParamSpec, TypeIs, TYPE_CHECKING

scripts.name: javascript-es6-patterns
scripts.description: Demonstrates ES6 patterns from Airbnb guide: object shorthand, spread, destructuring, arrow functions

scripts.name: nodejs-async-iteration
scripts.description: Demonstrates Node.js async patterns: for await...of, AbortSignal, Symbol.asyncIterator

scripts.name: bash-production-script
scripts.description: Production-ready Bash script with error handling, logging, cleanup, and retry logic

scripts.name: typescript-patterns
scripts.description: TypeScript patterns for Node.js: generics, utility types, async iterators, type-safe event emitters

python_backend.description: Python backend development with FastAPI and modern async patterns

nodejs_backend.description: Node.js backend with Express, Fastify, and async iteration

javascript_frontend.description: Modern JavaScript/TypeScript frontend with ES6 best practices

code_quality.description: Language-specific linting, formatting, and quality standards

testing_standards.description: TDD methodology and comprehensive testing requirements
